name: The Wizard Trials
description:
Welcome to The Wizard Trials, a fast paced fantasy shooter in 3rd person where you compete for the number 1 spot of a wizard tournament by using magical abilities and potions.

When you find yourself in the village, visit our shops to change your magical arsenal.

Go to Gertrude's Potion Mixer to buy ingredients and with them try out combination to succefully craft powerful potions.

Or go to Renfall's Library to buy spells or sell your old ones.

After getting ready for combat, head to the main door of the grand arena and get ready to face off against other AI-Controlled Wizards in 1v1 duels.

Beat all 3 combats of the tournament to be crowned the winner.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks, and we hope you enjoy our game.
